org.terrier.evaluation
Class AdhocEvaluation

java.lang.Object
  org.terrier.evaluation.Evaluation
      org.terrier.evaluation.AdhocEvaluation
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdhocFullQueryEvaluation
public class AdhocEvaluation
extends Evaluation

Performs the evaluation for TREC's tasks, except the named page task. The evaluation measures include the mean average precision and other measures such as precision at 10, precision at 10%, and so on....

Version:
$Revision: 1.33 $
Author:
Gianni Amati, Ben He

numberOfEffQuery

protected int numberOfEffQuery
The number of effective queries. An effective query is a query that has corresponding relevant documents in the qrels file.
